FuncDef:
The read-default permit command enables users to perform query operations.
The undo read-default permit command disables users from performing query operations. The read-default permit command enables users to perform query operations. The undo read-default permit command disables users from performing query operations. By default, the NACM function is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
To enable users to perform query operations, run the read-default permit command.
Supported query operations include get and get-config.
